trending.name: bit64
trending.title: A S3 Class for Vectors of 64bit Integers
trending.description:
Package 'bit64' provides serializable S3 atomic 64bit
(signed) integers. These are useful for handling database keys
and exact counting in +-2^63. WARNING: do not use them as
replacement for 32bit int

new.name: mixedBayes
new.title: Bayesian Longitudinal Regularized Quantile Mixed Model
new.description:
With high-dimensional omics features, repeated measure
ANOVA leads to longitudinal gene-environment interaction
studies that have intra-cluster correlations, outlying
observations and structured spars

new.name: glystats
new.title: Statistical Analysis of Glycoproteomics and Glycomics Data
new.description:

differential testing (t-test, Wilcoxon rank-sum test, ANOVA,

new.name: tsfeatures
